sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix"> <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <before>false</before> <description>Create a scheduled job to run time taking resource fix scripts for Kingston</description> <name>Populate Actuals on Allocations</name> <record_for_rollback>false</record_for_rollback> <script><![CDATA[var job = new GlideRecord('sysauto_script'); job.get('name', 'RM_Kingston_Upgrade'); SncTriggerSynchronizer.executeNow(job);]]></script> <sys_class_name>sys_script_fix</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2017-08-03 12:34:37</sys_created_on> <sys_id>b68d4d260bd80300a6acc93563673ad9</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>Populate Actuals on Allocations</sys_name> <sys_package display_value="Resource Management" source="com.snc.resource_management">7200da2b47e64210cd4e1ce4316d438e</sys_package> <sys_policy/> <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_script_fix_b68d4d260bd80300a6acc93563673ad9</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2017-08-03 12:34:37</sys_updated_on> <unloadable>false</unloadable> </sys_script_fix> </record_update>
